text: Kare wa ryoshin o koza ni nobora seta. Suruto ichido wa kare ni hirefushita. Suruto kare wa itta. `Watashi no chichiyo, korega onen no watashi no yume no kaishakudesu. Waga omo wa, sore o shinjitsu ni nasaimashita. Hontoni kare wa, watashi ni oncho o atae, rogoku kara watashi o o-dashi ni nari, mata akuma ga, watashi to kyodai to no ma ni bimyona tekii o kakitateta nochi, sabaku kara anata gata o tsurete ko rareta nodearimasu. Waga omo wa, o nozomi no mono ni wa nasakebukaku ara remasu. Hontoni kare wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara remasu
